subject: Soccer
lead_paragraph: Brad Guzan, an up-and-coming goalkeeper for Chivas USA and the United States national team, was oh-so-close to being gone to Aston Villa of the English Premier League. Enter the bureaucrats.
snippet: Brad Guzan, an up-and-coming goalkeeper for Chivas USA and the United States national team, was oh-so-close to being gone to Aston Villa of the English Premier League. Enter the bureaucrats.
